2. Tables¶

Segmentations are to tables what a means is to an end. In this section, you will learn how to go from the ones to the others.

  • 2.1. From segmentations to tables
  • 2.2. Converting between table formats
  • 2.3. Counting segment types
  • 2.4. Counting in specific contexts
